name: Shadow Edolon
description: hope is always there, despair always follows. Like a shadow following us. Hope can be built with feelings. Edolon Shadow has 4 feelings: happy, sad, hopeless, & proud. Edolon said you can't control other people's feelings but your feelings are always under your control. an environment where it definitely has side effects that result in a bad mood, then wake up to create a good environment.
